definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Huzhu Tuzu autonomous county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
Huzhu Tuzu autonomous county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
neither giving way to the other

sentences.english: The lovers were making sheep's eyes at each other over the table.
sentences.chinese: 那对恋人隔著桌子互送秋波。

sentences.english: It not only avoids computing cross-covariance matrices but also improves local estimation accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 避免了计算互协方差阵，且能改善局部估计的精度。

sentences.english: Then using the principles, we analyse the mutual conductances between elements on cylindrical slot conformal array antennas.
sentences.chinese: 分析了圆柱缝隙共形阵天线单元间的互导纳。

sentences.english: But up to now there are only FFT and Cross-periodogram methods used in cross-spectral estimation.
sentences.chinese: 但以往互谱估计都是采用FFT方法和互周期图法。

sentences.english: But up to now there are only FFT and Cross-periodogram methods used in cross-spectral estimation.
sentences.chinese: 但以往互谱估计都是采用FFT方法和互周期图法。

sentences.english: He said that people exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 他说人们常在圣诞节互送礼物。
他们相互举手击掌互致敬意。

sentences.english: Our interaction forms the strange new herd.
sentences.chinese: 我们的互作用形成奇怪的新牧群。

sentences.english: Almost every day, they had exchanged text messages.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每天他们都在互发短信。

sentences.english: Take length of human, make up short oneself, thus raises the writing level.
sentences.chinese: 互借鉴，取人之长，补己之短，从而提高作文水平。

sentences.english: Among themselves they had contacts and replying writing activities but not that close and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 他们之间互有交往和酬唱，但是并不密切和频繁。

sentences.english: Peace to you and the Lord loves you indeed.
sentences.chinese: 互道平安，说声主真爱你。

sentences.english: Laughing over a good movie, spooning in bed, toasting our glasses.
sentences.chinese: 看一场好电影时大笑，在床上互喂食物，敬酒。

sentences.english: The dollar was mixed and gold rose.
sentences.chinese: 美元对主要货币互有涨跌，黄金价格上涨。

sentences.english: At the first sight Paul and Anna changed eyes.
sentences.chinese: 保罗和安娜初次见面就互送秋波。

sentences.english: Bisimulation is often chosen as the equivalence relation in equivalence checking.
sentences.chinese: 在等价验证中，通常选择互模拟作为等价关系。

definition: accord/to make contact/to agree/to consult with/extensive
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
to follow each other's accounts (on Weibo etc)
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
variant of 蒞|莅[li4], to attend
